name.en: Research Topics in Environmental Ethics I

goal.ch: 本課程嘗試幫助學員達成以下目標：(1)正確地理解環境問題及環境倫理之內涵（“What”的問題）；(2)意識到自行思考環境及其倫理問題的重要性，並培養如何自行思考相關問題及解題的能力（“How”的問題）；(3)明白環境問題不只存在於吾人周遭，更在異域及他方，而需要眾人一體關懷、考量全球環境問題（“Why”的問題）；(4)體認個人成為環境保全者的責無旁貸，並進而把自己的家族融合成一個環保家庭的迫切性；(5)總說：現在要做什麼？如何做？基於什麼理由一定要這樣做？
goal.en: In this course the students will learn environmental ethics and its main theories, which can fundamentally be a resource as reference system for contemporary environmental philosophy and discourse of ethics. This course also intends to help students understand how to write a treatise of environmental ethics.

outline.ch:
1.概論
2.理解環境倫理
3.環境倫理學的主要發展及其梗概
4.環境倫理的實踐向度
5.總結（論文寫作）
outline.en:
1.Overview: Macrostudy and Microstudy of Environmental Ethics
2.Understanding Environmental Ethic: An Analysis
3.A Synopsis: The Development of Environment Ethics
4.The Dimensions of the Practice of Environmental Ethic
5.Thesis Writing

gradMethod.ch: 課堂報告及討論：30％，期末論文：70％
gradMethod.en: Oral Report and Discussion: 30％, Term Paper: 70％

ability to think critically and creatively
ability to undertake research and teaching
ability to apply theory to real world
ability to appreciate arts and humanities
